string.text: I've got to the Rostok Factory; now I need to meet the Duty squad leader and offer those guys my help.

There are casualties among Dima's guys: a few soldiers sent to the factory turf haven't returned since. I need to find their PDAs and kill whatever threat there is. I should also inspect their HQ while wearing a gas mask: the local scientists gassed it to help poison the occupants; they can also provide me a spare gas mask.

Dima agreed to grant me Lab X-14 key provided that I'll eliminate the mutants nest located there. I can't say the beasts outside were hard to deal with, but who the hell knows what's going on underground...
I must get rid of the Lab X-14 mutants nest to meet Dima's expectations, he gave me the key because of which.
The combination opening the safe at the Rostok Factory is 4-3-7.
